title: NEL service delayed towards Punggol due to train fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: NEL服务因列车故障延误至榜鹅
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan NEL tertangguh ke arah Punggol kerana kerosakan kereta api
title_translations.ta: புங்கிலுக்கு செல்லும் NEL சேவை ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக தாமதமானது

updates.text:
NEL is back to regular svc. Once again, we are very sorry for the inconvenience 
caused

NEL svc twds Punggol NE17 is delayed due to a train fault. Additional travel 
time of about 10 minutes may be expected. We are sorry.
